sentences: In his teens he also performed with Phil Cohran and the Sun Ra Arkestra.
He was also an integral part of the rhythm section of Detroit group Griot Galaxy, along with bassist Jaribu Shahid.
In 2001 he was successfully treated for a brain tumour.
In 2007, Tani released a solo percussion CD, entitled Before Time After.
